error.missingConfirmationLink: [en] Did not provide a confirmation link search parameter
error.invalidConfirmationStructure: [en] The provided confirmation link has not the right structure
error.missingRedirect: [en] Did not provide a redirect_to search parameter
error.invalidRedirectUrlStructure: [en] The redirect_to url has not the right structure
error.invalidRedirectPathStructure: [en] The login_redirect path has not the right structure
error.missingToken: [en] Did not provide a token search parameter
error.tokenNoHex: [en] The token parameter is not a hex value
error.missingTypeSearch: [en] Did not provide a type search parameter
error.noEmailChange: [en] The type parameter is not of type email_change
